name: Maginary
description:
Michael Sterry also read this book. But when, a few weeks later, he woke up in some other world, completely unknown to him, he had a distinct feeling that now somebody else was reading about him.
And only you, the new reader, can bring him home — to our reality. To make it happen, you will have to interact with Michael and his world by performing some unusual actions with this book. You will need to use your brains, your hands and even your legs...

Here’s your chance to erase the thin line between your imagination and reality.


-----

An immersive quest book that will allow you to get lost in your imagination with the help of:
* Over 70 beautiful animations with typography
* Audio and video sfx that will be adjusted to your reading speed
* Original plot with interesting twists
* Original soundtrack
* Marvellous puzzles and interactions with your iPhone
* You as the book’s main character


-----
This is a game for those who believe that the coolest graphics and augmented reality can be found in their own mind.


-----
For the best experience, use iPhone and headphones.

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us via hello@maginary.app
